panel.title: Component discovery via roles found in Metrics

table.title: This requires over a 60 min scan to get all the events

search.query: $selected_internal$ INFO TERM(instance_roles=*) (search_head OR cluster_master OR indexer) sourcetype=splunkd TERM(group=instance) | fields host instance_roles index_cluster_label | eval search_head=if(like(instance_roles,"%search_head%"),1,0), cluster_master=if(like(instance_roles,"%cluster_master%"),1,0), indexer=if(like(instance_roles,"%indexer%"),1,0) | stats values(eval(if(search_head=1,host,""))) as search_heads values(eval(if(cluster_master=1,host,""))) as cluster_master values(eval(if(indexer=1,host,""))) as indexer by index_cluster_label | eval search_heads="host IN (".mvjoin(mvfilter(search_heads!=""), ", ").")", cluster_master="host IN (".mvjoin(mvfilter(cluster_master!=""), ", ").")", indexer="host IN (".mvjoin(mvfilter(indexer!=""), ", ").")"

table.title: This is efficient in that is requires scanning over 30 seconds

search.query: $selected_internal$ Metrics Info TERM(name=cmmaster_service) sourcetype=splunkd TERM(group=subtask_counts) | stats values(host) as search | eval search="host IN (".mvjoin(search, ", ").")" | fields + search

panel.title: Search head cluster members via Metrics

search.query: $selected_internal$ host=sh* sourcetype=splunkd sched_dispatch | stats values(host) as search | eval search="host IN (".mvjoin(search, ", ").")" | fields + search
| rest /services/cluster/slave/info | stats dc(splunk_server) as host_count values(splunk_server) as indexer by site | eval indexer="host IN (".mvjoin(mvfilter(indexer!=""), ", ").")"

search.query: $selected_internal$ sourcetype=splunkd CMMaster status=success site* | rex field=_raw "site(?<site_id>\d+)" | stats values(peer_name) as indexer by site_id | eval host_count=mvcount(indexer), indexer="host IN (".mvjoin(mvfilter(indexer!=""), ", ").")"
